wikipedia_page.main: Simon "Ossie" Stewart  (born 31 January 1954) is a British sailor. He won a bronze medal in the Soling class at the 1992 Summer Olympics with Lawrie Smith and Robert Cruickshank.

response: Lawrie Smith (born 19 February 1956) is a British sailor. He won a bronze medal in the soling class at the 1992 Summer Olympics with Robert Cruikshank and Ossie Stewart.
Robert Cruickshank (born 19 February 1963) is a British sailor. He won a bronze medal in the Soling class at the 1992 Summer Olympics with Lawrie Smith and Ossie Stewart.
